query: The subset of activities 12, 21, 7 is not completed at the same time period
p:12/7: activity 7 must be completed before starting activity 12
p:22/21: activity 21 must be completed before starting activity 22
p:24/22: activity 22 must be completed before starting activity 24
p:25/24: activity 24 must be completed before starting activity 25
p:30/25: activity 25 must be completed before starting activity 30
p:32/30: activity 30 must be completed before starting activity 32
